trans-unit.source: Microsoft Enterprise Mobility
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Enterprise Mobility

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Enterprise Mobility
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Enterprise Mobility

trans-unit.source: Microsoft's Enterprise Mobility solutions enable organizations to keep their employees productive across apps and devices while ensuring that corporate data is protected.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft's Enterprise Mobility solutions enable organizations to keep their employees productive across apps and devices while ensuring that corporate data is protected.

trans-unit.source: Select a solution for in-depth technical knowledge and documentation or read about common scenarios that require multiple Enterprise Mobility solutions to come together and solve a business problem.
trans-unit.target: Select a solution for in-depth technical knowledge and documentation or read about common scenarios that require multiple Enterprise Mobility solutions to come together and solve a business problem.

trans-unit.source: Identity and Access Management
trans-unit.target: Identity and Access Management

trans-unit.source: Enterprise-grade identity and access management for nearly any app or device, cloud, or on-premises.
trans-unit.target: Enterprise-grade identity and access management for nearly any app or device, cloud, or on-premises.

trans-unit.source: Delivers single sign-on, multi-factor authentication, self-service passwords, and more
trans-unit.target: Delivers single sign-on, multi-factor authentication, self-service passwords, and more

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: Synchronize on-premises directories and enable single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Synchronize on-premises directories and enable single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: Safeguard access to your data and apps with an extra level of authentication
trans-unit.target: Safeguard access to your data and apps with an extra level of authentication

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Identity Manager
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Identity Manager

trans-unit.source: Configure identity and access management that is secure, flexible, and cloud ready
trans-unit.target: Configure identity and access management that is secure, flexible, and cloud ready

trans-unit.source: Mobile Device and Application Management
trans-unit.target: Mobile Device and Application Management

trans-unit.source: Cloud-based enterprise mobility management that helps you control employee access to corporate applications and data on virtually any device
trans-unit.target: Cloud-based enterprise mobility management that helps you control employee access to corporate applications and data on virtually any device

trans-unit.source: Intune
trans-unit.target: Intune

trans-unit.source: Manage and protect corporate apps and data on devices using the MDM and MAM capabilities of Intune
trans-unit.target: Manage and protect corporate apps and data on devices using the MDM and MAM capabilities of Intune

trans-unit.source: Information Protection and Security
trans-unit.target: Information Protection and Security

trans-unit.source: Protect corporate data by allowing more secure access to company resources and enabling safe sharing of sensitive information inside and outside your organization
trans-unit.target: Protect corporate data by allowing more secure access to company resources and enabling safe sharing of sensitive information inside and outside your organization

trans-unit.source: Azure Rights Management
trans-unit.target: Azure Rights Management

trans-unit.source: Protect your information from unauthorized access and control how information is used
trans-unit.target: Protect your information from unauthorized access and control how information is used

trans-unit.source: Advanced Threat Analytics
trans-unit.target: Advanced Threat Analytics

trans-unit.source: Identify breaches and threats using behavioral analysis and create reports on a simple attack timeline
trans-unit.target: Identify breaches and threats using behavioral analysis and create reports on a simple attack timeline

trans-unit.source: Desktop Virtualization
trans-unit.target: Desktop Virtualization

trans-unit.source: Stream applications from your datacenter or the cloud to keep users productive anywhere, on any device, and your data more secure
trans-unit.target: Stream applications from your datacenter or the cloud to keep users productive anywhere, on any device, and your data more secure

trans-unit.source: Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: Deploy Windows cloud apps in the cloud and run on any device
trans-unit.target: Deploy Windows cloud apps in the cloud and run on any device
